statements: SELECT * FROM articles WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, author FROM articles WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT content FROM articles WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT id, title, author, publication_date FROM articles WHERE id BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT * FROM articles ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT id, title FROM articles WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT author, title, publication_date FROM articles ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT author, content FROM articles WHERE content LIKE '%software%';
SELECT id, title, author FROM articles WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM articles;
SELECT article_title, article_author FROM articles WHERE article_author = 'John Doe';
SELECT article_title, article_content, scraping_date FROM articles ORDER BY scraping_date DESC;
SELECT article_title, article_content FROM articles WHERE article_id = 1;
SELECT bias_type FROM biases;
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE article_id = 5;
SELECT article_author, article_title FROM articles WHERE article_content IS NOT NULL ORDER BY article_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM articles WHERE article_author = 'John Doe';
SELECT article_author, COUNT(article_id) AS article_count FROM articles GROUP BY article_author HAVING COUNT(article_id) > 1;
SELECT article_title, article_content, bias_type FROM articles INNER JOIN biases ON articles.article_id = biases.article_id ORDER BY scraping_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM articles ORDER BY publish_date DESC
SELECT title, author FROM articles WHERE author = 'John Doe'
SELECT COUNT(*), bias_category FROM analysis_results GROUP BY bias_category HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT a.title, b.description FROM articles a JOIN biases b ON a.title LIKE '%' || b.description || '%'
SELECT * FROM analysis_results WHERE analysis_score > 0.8 ORDER BY analysis_date ASC
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE author='John Doe';
SELECT * FROM articles ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT articles.title, analysis_results.bias_category FROM articles JOIN analysis_results ON articles.article_id = analysis_results.article_id WHERE analysis_results.analysis_score > 0.8;

SELECT articles.title, analysis_results.analysis_score, biases.description FROM articles JOIN analysis_results ON articles.article_id = analysis_results.article_id JOIN biases ON analysis_results.bias_category = biases.bias_category;
SELECT author, COUNT(*) as num_articles FROM articles GROUP BY author HAVING num_articles > 2 ORDER BY num_articles DESC;
SELECT * FROM articles;
SELECT article_id, title, publication_date FROM articles WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT title, content FROM articles WHERE title LIKE '%SQL%';
SELECT author_id, name, email, organization FROM authors ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT ac.article_id, ac.category_id, c.name FROM article_categories ac JOIN categories c ON ac.category_id = c.category_id;
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT title, publication_date FROM articles WHERE title LIKE '%database%' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;

SELECT articles.title, authors.name, categories.name FROM articles INNER JOIN authors ON articles.author_id = authors.author_id INNER JOIN article_categories ON articles.article_id = article_categories.article_id INNER JOIN categories ON article_categories.category_id = categories.category_id WHERE categories.name = 'Technology';
SELECT authors.name, articles.title, articles.publication_date FROM authors INNER JOIN articles ON authors.author_id = articles.author_id ORDER BY articles.publication_date ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT articles.title, authors.name, categories.name FROM articles INNER JOIN authors ON articles.author_id = authors.author_id LEFT JOIN article_categories ON articles.article_id = article_categories.article_id INNER JOIN categories ON article_categories.category_id = categories.category_id ORDER BY articles.publication_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM articles
SELECT title, author, publish_date FROM articles
SELECT id, title, content FROM articles WHERE author = 'John Doe'
SELECT * FROM articles ORDER BY publish_date DESC
SELECT author, COUNT(*) as num_articles FROM articles GROUP BY author
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE author = 'John Doe' ORDER BY publish_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, title, author FROM articles WHERE publish_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY publish_date ASC
SELECT id, title, content FROM articles WHERE content LIKE '%important%' AND author = 'Jane Smith'
SELECT id, title FROM articles WHERE publish_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE author = 'John Doe' AND title LIKE '%interesting%'
